column6:
Nestled into a beautiful historic neighborhood that is Cultural District adjacent, The Guesthouse is conveniently located and accessible to all Fort Worth events, life, and culture. The following locations are only a short drive away, some even within walking distance
-The Stock Show
 -Botanical Gardens
-Bass Hall
-Water Gardens
-Trinity Park
-The Trinity Trails
-Museum District
-7th Street District
-Historic Stock Yards
- Magnolia District 
-UNTHSC
-Sundance Square and many more!!
